contributionDescription: I will use OP every day and will invite friends. Let's understand what OP is and what OP will be like in the future. I want everyone to participate in OP's future growth, not profit from short-term OP coin prices. OP will be a strong, transparent, and auditable community.
impactDescription: In my country, Thailand, I see injustice, corruption, monopoly, and small capital cannot fight against monopoly capital. I want to see a future world with transparency and antitrust. It can make small people fight against big capitalists. I want to see fairness in society and hope OP will be like that.
